item.title: You Need Empathy
item.description: An interesting notion came to me. In the shower, I was musing about my lack of ideas for topics to write about. I briefly explored the possibility that I simply don’t have that many interesting thoughts. Maybe just forcing myself to write stuff out just made that obvious, but I don’t think it’s as simple as that. I can talk peoples’ ears off in real life. It’s simple; I just expect you to know everything I already do.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About me I haven’t decided how much I want to reveal yet. Probably not that much.
